title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story FULL SPOILERS Review - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
We review the first Star Wars Story.

http://www.casper.com/kindafunny
Thank you to Casper for supporting our channel! Get $50 off toward any mattress purchase by clicking the link above and using promo code “kindafunny.”

Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
